"Hi Professor!<br>Nice to meet you again:
"It's practical training at the Cauldron
this time! We look forward to your
coaching today!"

"Exchange a dash with Fordran and
destroy its horns! Please teach us the
battle strategy, Professor!"

"Practical training was demanding but
we had tremendous help from you!
I will continue to train hard!"

"押忍！
先生、今回もよろしくお願いします！"

"今回は、火山洞窟での実地研修です！
同行を是非お願いします！"

"フォードランの突進をかわし
角を破壊する！
先生、戦い方をご教授ください！"

"実地研修は過酷なものですが
先生の力添えがあれば百人力！
自分、がんばります！"
